xwikidoc.name: WebSearch
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.martagirdea
xwikidoc.content:
1 Search
This page allows you to search for the content of this web site. It does not include searching the educational resources contributed to this site. For this you should use the [Contribute Content Search>AssetManager.Search] which is accessible if you are a [member>Main.JoinCurriki].
<form action=""> <input type="text" name="text" value="$!request.text" /> #button("Search" "red" "submit" "" "") </form>
#if($request.space) #set ($sql = "where doc.web='$request.space' and doc.content like '%$!request.text%' order by doc.date desc") #else #set ($sql = "where doc.content like '%$!request.text%' order by doc.date desc") #end #includeInContext("XWiki.Results")
